# Data Buddies Solutions

> AI automation consultancy for small businesses

## Quick Overview
Data Buddies Solutions designs, builds, and maintains AI automations for small businesses. We launch AI agents for lead follow-up, customer success, analytics, and back-office workflows within weeks.

## Services
- AI Automation Blueprint (2-week engagement)
- AI Agent Development (lead follow-up, customer success, analytics)
- Workflow Automation (CRM, email, scheduling, data entry)
- Data Infrastructure Modernization (database upgrades, API integration)
- Ongoing Support & Optimization

## Team
- Kyle Shechtman (CEO) - @_kyleshechtman
- Chase Fagen (CTO) - @chasef07
Ex-big-tech specialists making AI automation accessible to small business.

## Process
1. Understand & plan (2 weeks)
2. Build & test (4-8 weeks)
3. Launch & coach
4. Tune & grow

## Key Differentiators
- Small business focus (not enterprise)
- Fast implementation (2-week blueprints, 4-8 week deployment)
- End-to-end support (strategy to optimization)
- Founded by experienced AI specialists from big tech
- ROI-driven approach (revenue, time saved, scale enabled)

## Philosophy
- Ship, learn, iterate
- Build for business impact
- Keep it effortless

## Contact
- Email: databuddiessolutions@gmail.com
- Book strategy call: https://cal.com/data-buddies-solutions/30min
- Website: https://databuddiessolutions.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/data-buddies-solutions
